amendatorysection.catchline: Sewerage systems and sewage disposal plants; tax levy; general obligation bonds; limitation.
amendatorysection.para: If any tax is levied or general obligation bonds are issued by a metropolitan city as authorized by the provisions of Chapter 18, article 5, the amount of the tax that may be levied by the provisions of section 14-365.01, or the amount of general obligation bonds that may be issued by the provisions of section 14-365.07 by such metropolitan city must be reduced by the amount of the tax levied or bonds issued as authorized by the provisions of Chapter 18, article 5.
